description: Front-wheel drive sedan class B. The restyled version of the second generation of the Logan model is presented at the Paris Motor Show in 2016 under the Dacia brand.
overview: Although the overall body line of the Renault Logan remained unchanged, the car began to look more modern and presentable.The frontal part of the sedan has completely changed its appearance, having received new LED running lights in the headlights, rounded radiator grilles, new forms of bumpers and edging of foglights.Logan interior has become more refined. It now features chrome accents and new dashboard trims, and the new steering wheel with its exclusive Soft Feel braiding is incredibly soft and comfortable to the touch and is height adjustable.

specifications.name: Engine capacity(l):
specifications.hint: Engine capacity refers to the volume swept by all the pistons of an engine, within their bores, from the top to the bottom of their travel.

specifications.name: Horse power(hp):
specifications.hint: Horsepower (hp) is a unit of measurement of power, or the rate at which work is done, usually in reference to the output of engines or motors.

specifications.name: Torque(Nm):
specifications.hint: Torque is a twisting force that speaks to the engine's rotational force and measures how much of that twisting force is available when an engine exerts itself.
